taxonomicnotes: Roberts (2007) described Danio margaritatus as Celestichthys margaritatus. Conway et al. (2008) treated it under genus Danio.
rationale: The species is known from its original description location in eastern Myanmar, a further 4-5 other locations in the Salween River basin, as well as from a single location in Thailand adjacent to the Myanmar border. Further information should be sought from the aquarium trade regarding sources of specimens and the proportion of captive-bred species in the trade. More research is needed to find out its true range and population status, as well as the impact of the aquarium trade. It is therefore considered as Data Deficient at present.
evaluator: Barbhuiya, A.H., Juffe Bignoli, D., Rema Devi, K.R., Dahanukar, N. & Chaudhry, S.
